# Outdated
This model became outdated when the [biopsychosocial model]({{< var ref-biopsychosocial-model.path >}}) was created. The [biopsychosocial model]({{< var ref-biopsychosocial-model.path >}}) included the biomedical model, but also added psychological considerations, and social considerations.
